TM.name: Focus Punch
TM.information: Attacks after turn is over. Flinches if hit.
TM.suggestion: Use this in combination with Substitute.

TM.name: Dragon Claw
TM.information: Nothing special as far as added effects go.
TM.suggestion: Good against dragon Pokemon.

TM.name: Water Pulse
TM.information: 10% chance of confusion.
TM.suggestion: Good if you like confusing the foe.

TM.name: Calm Mind
TM.information: This raises special attack and special defense.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 48 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: If you can manage to do six of these, you will become nearly invincible. Even one, though, can help.

TM.name: Roar
TM.information: Forces trainer to switch Pokemon. Also can be used to flee from wild Pokemon.
TM.suggestion: A good counter for stat-increasing moves used on the foe.

TM.name: Toxic
TM.information: Poisons the foe. Poison gets stronger as turns progress.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 32 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Great if you can land it on all the opponent's Pokemon.

TM.name: Hail
TM.information: Hail starts. Hurts all Pokemon except ice Pokemon.
TM.suggestion: Use with caution. It can backfire.

TM.name: Bulk Up
TM.information: Boosts both attack and defense.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 48 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Good for combo moves.

TM.name: Bullet Seed
TM.information: This attacks 2-5 times per turn.
TM.suggestion: Good to start with, but you should not use it in competitive battles.

TM.name: Hidden Power
TM.information: Type and power depends on the Pokemon.Location: Kotobuki City2nd
TM.suggestion: This can be good or bad depending on the opponent's Pokemon.

TM.name: Sunny Day
TM.information: This boosts fire-type moves for 5 turns. Only 1 turn required for solarbeam.
TM.suggestion: Use with caution. It can backfire (but not too much).

TM.name: Taunt
TM.information: Taunts foe into using only attack-based moves.
TM.suggestion: Good way to prevent stat-increasing moves.

TM.name: Ice Beam
TM.information: 10% chance of becoming frozen.Location: Route 2162nd
TM.suggestion: Awesome. This should be your ice move of choice.

TM.name: Blizzard
TM.information: 10% chance of becoming frozen.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 5500 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Great if you can land it.

TM.name: Hyper Beam
TM.information: Attacks for massive damage. Cannot attack second turn.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 7500 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Should be used as a finishing move.

TM.name: Light Screen
TM.information: This lowers special attack damage.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 2000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Great if you have a Blissey and all your opponent's Pokemon use special attacks.

TM.name: Protect
TM.information: Prevents being attacked for that turn. It may fail if used continuously.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 2000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: A good stalling move.

TM.name: Rain Dance
TM.information: This boosts water-type moves for 5 turns. Thunder cannot miss.
TM.suggestion: Use with caution. It can backfire (but not too much).

TM.name: Giga Drain
TM.information: Half of the inflicted damaged is restored to user's HP.
TM.suggestion: Decent attack.

TM.name: Safeguard
TM.information: Prevents all status problems for the entire party.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 2000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Good move.

TM.name: Frustration
TM.information: The power is stronger the more the Pokemon hates you.
TM.suggestion: Use if your Pokemon hate you a bunch.

TM.name: Solarbeam
TM.information: Charges up the first turn and strikes the second.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 3000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Good for grass-type Pokemon. Awesome when used with Sunny Day.

TM.name: Iron Tail
TM.information: This may lower the foe's defense (10% chance).
TM.suggestion: Powerful, but not accurate enough.

TM.name: Thunderbolt
TM.information: 10% chance of becoming paralyzed.Location: Above the Power Plant (use surf to get it).2nd
TM.location: Above the Power Plant (use surf to get it).
TM.suggestion: Awesome. This should be your electric move of choice.

TM.name: Thunder
TM.information: 10% chance of becoming paralyzed.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 5500 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Great if you can land it. Awesome when used with Rain dance.

TM.name: Earthquake
TM.information: If foe is using dig, damage is doubled.Location: Cave of Doubt (Secret Entrance)2nd
TM.suggestion: Simply put, this move is quite incredible.

TM.name: Return
TM.information: The power is stronger the more the Pokemon likes you.Location: Lost Tower2nd
TM.suggestion: Use if your Pokemon like you a bunch.

TM.name: Dig
TM.information: Digs underground the first turn and attacks the second turn.
TM.suggestion: Good move to use if you want an earthquake alternative.

TM.name: Psychic
TM.information: This may lower the foe's defense (10% chance).
TM.suggestion: Awesome. This should be your psychic move of choice.

TM.name: Shadow Ball
TM.information: This may lower the foe's defense (20% chance).Location: Route 2102nd
TM.suggestion: Awesome. This should be your ghost move of choice.

TM.name: Brick Break
TM.information: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 40 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: A decent fighting attack.

TM.name: Double Team
TM.information: Increases evasiveness
TM.suggestion: A risky move, but it could pay off.

TM.name: Reflect
TM.information: This lowers attack damage.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 2000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Decent defender.

TM.name: Shock Wave
TM.information: Never misses
TM.suggestion: If you like accuracy, this is for you.

TM.name: Flamethrower
TM.information: 10% chance of becoming burned.
TM.suggestion: Awesome. This should be your fire move of choice.

TM.name: Sludge Bomb
TM.information: 30% chance of becoming poisoned.Location: Team Galaxy Warehouse2nd
TM.suggestion: Awesome. This should be your poison move of choice.

TM.name: Sandstorm
TM.information: A sandstorm starts. Hurts all Pokemon except ground, rock, and steel Pokemon.
TM.suggestion: Use with caution. It can backfire.

TM.name: Fire Blast
TM.information: 10% chance of becoming burned.Location: Trust Lake2nd
TM.suggestion: Decent accuracy. Use only if you think your Pokemon is powerful enough to knock out a foe in one hit with this move.

TM.name: Rock Tomb
TM.information: This will lower the foe's speed
TM.suggestion: This can become quite annoying if you use it properly, but it can easily be countered. Try not to use this more than a couple of times unless you have to.

TM.name: Aerial Ace
TM.information: Never misses.Location: Route 2132nd
TM.suggestion: If you like accuracy, this is for you.

TM.name: Torment
TM.information: Foe is unable to use the same move twice in a row.
TM.suggestion: This can become a pain for the opponent if used correctly.

TM.name: Facade
TM.information: Doubles attack if burned, Poison, Paralyzed.
TM.suggestion: 160 Base Power Slaking + 140 attack move = ??? You do the math. :P

TM.name: Secret Power
TM.information: The effect of this move depends on the location.
TM.suggestion: If you know where you are, it's a good move.

TM.name: Rest
TM.information: The user becomes asleep. Lasts 2 turns.
TM.suggestion: Great for Pokemon with high HP.

TM.name: Attract
TM.information: Makes the opposite gender less likely to attack (50%).
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 32 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Good if your opponent's Pokemon have the same gender and they are opposite from the Pokemon on your team using charm.

TM.name: Thief
TM.information: Has a chance of taking the foe's held item.
TM.suggestion: Useful when trying to get a foe's held item.

TM.name: Steel Wing
TM.information: This may increase the user's defense (10%).
TM.suggestion: Decent steel maneuver.

TM.name: Skill Swap
TM.information: Switches abilities with foe.
TM.location: Mio City (from a resident in the city)
TM.suggestion: Use strategically. It can backfire.

TM.name: Snatch
TM.information: This steals the effects of the foe's next move.
TM.suggestion: Good if the foe keeps using stat-increasing moves.

TM.name: Overheat
TM.information: This lowers the user's special attack.
TM.suggestion: This can be a good alternative to Fire Blast.

TM.name: Roost
TM.information: This restores half of Max HP.
TM.suggestion: Great recover move.

TM.name: Focus Blast
TM.information: This may lower the foe's speed.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 5500 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Great if you can land it.

TM.name: Energy Ball
TM.information: This may lower the foe's speed.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 64 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Great grass-based attack.

TM.name: False Swipe
TM.information: Always leaves the foe with at least 1 HP.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 2000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Incredible when lowering legendary's HP for capture.

TM.name: Brine
TM.information: Power is 130 if Pokemon's HP is less than half.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Fling
TM.information: This move hurls out the item the Pokemon is holding. The power of the move depends on the item.
TM.suggestion: Use if you have a good item.

TM.name: Charge Beam
TM.information: A high chance of raising the Pokemon's special attack.
TM.suggestion: A decent electric attack.

TM.name: Endure
TM.information: Always leaves the Pokemon with at least 1 HP. It may fail if used continuously.
TM.suggestion: A good move for stalling.

TM.name: Dragon Pulse
TM.information: Nothing special as far as added effects go.Location: Victory Road2nd
TM.suggestion: An excellent dragon attack. Good against dragon Pokemon.

TM.name: Drain Punch
TM.information: Half of the inflicted damaged is restored to user's HP.
TM.suggestion: Decent attack.

TM.name: Will-O-Wisp
TM.information: Burns the foe.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 32 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Great if you can land it on all the opponent's Pokemon.

TM.name: Silver Wind
TM.information: May raise abilities.
TM.suggestion: Decent attack. Good if you can raise abilities.

TM.name: Embargo
TM.information: Prevents foe from using held items.
TM.suggestion: Great if you want to disable leftovers or other items.

TM.name: Explosion
TM.information: User faints with user.
TM.suggestion: Use only as a last resort.

TM.name: Shadow Claw
TM.information: Has a high chance of landing a critical hit.
TM.suggestion: Good if you can land critical hits.

TM.name: Payback
TM.information: Power is 100 if foe attacks first.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Recycle
TM.information: Recycles a used item for one more use.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Giga Impact
TM.information: Attacks for massive damage. Cannot attack second turn.
TM.suggestion: Should be used as a finishing move.

TM.name: Rock Polish
TM.information: Greatly raises Pokemon's speed.
TM.suggestion: Decent move.

TM.name: Flash
TM.information: Lowers the foe's accuracy.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 1000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Decent Move.

TM.name: Stone Edge
TM.information: Has a high chance of landing a critical hit.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 64 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Great against flying Pokemon.

TM.name: Avalanche
TM.information: Power is 120 if foe attacks first.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Thunder Wave
TM.information: Paralyzes the foe.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 32 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Personally, I really like this move. Great as an annoyer.

TM.name: Gyro Ball
TM.information: Power depends on the foe's speed.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Swords Dance
TM.information: Sharply raises Pokemon's attack.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well in combination with attack moves.

TM.name: Stealth Rock
TM.information: Causes damage when opponent switches Pokemon.
TM.suggestion: This can be a good annoyer.

TM.name: Psych Up
TM.information: Copies the foe's effects and gives to the user.
TM.suggestion: Great to use if the foe has just used a lot of stat-increasing moves.

TM.name: Captivate
TM.information: If the foe is the opposite gender of the user, then the foe's special attack will be lowered.
TM.suggestion: Good if your opponent's Pokemon have the same gender and they are opposite from the Pokemon on your team using charm.

TM.name: Dark Pulse
TM.information: May cause flinching.
TM.suggestion: Great dark-type attack.

TM.name: Rock Slide
TM.information: May cause flinching.
TM.suggestion: Decent attack.

TM.name: X-Scissor
TM.information: Nothing special as far as added effects go.
TM.location: Exchange at Fight Area with 64 (Battle Points)
TM.suggestion: Great bug-type attack.

TM.name: Sleep Talk
TM.information: Uses a random move in its own moveset while asleep.
TM.suggestion: Great way to counter the effects of sleep.

TM.name: Nature Gift
TM.information: The power of the move depends on the held berry.
TM.location: Buy at Tobari Department Store with 2000 (Money)
TM.suggestion: Use if you have a good berry.

TM.name: Poison Jab
TM.information: Foe may become poisoned.
TM.suggestion: Use on Poison Pokemon with a high attack.

TM.name: Dream Eater
TM.information: Half of the inflicted damaged is restored to user's HP. This attack only works while the foe is asleep.
TM.suggestion: Great if you can land a Hypnosis + Dream Eater combination.

TM.name: Grass Knot
TM.information: Power depends on the foe's weight.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Swagger
TM.information: Raises the foe's attack but also causes confusion
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Pluck
TM.information: Power is 120 if the foe is holding a berry.
TM.suggestion: Great if the foe is holding a berry.

TM.name: U-Turn
TM.information: User switches out automatically after attack.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well.

TM.name: Substitute
TM.information: Creates a substitute using 1/4 of user's Max HP.Location: Forest Manor2nd
TM.suggestion: Use this in combination with Focus Punch.

TM.name: Flash Cannon
TM.information: May lower the foe's special attack.
TM.suggestion: Use on a Steel Pokemon who has a high special attack.

TM.name: Trick Room
TM.information: Slower Pokemon attack first for 5 turns.
TM.suggestion: Can be deadly if used strategically well in combination with slow, high-attack Pokemon.

HM.name: Cut
HM.information: Outside of battle, this cuts plants in the way. Inside of battle, nothing special as far as added effects go.
HM.suggestion: If you have to use it, put in on a Grass Pokemon.

HM.name: Fly
HM.information: Outside of battle, this will be your main way of transporting from one city to another quickly. Inside of battle, flies in the sky the first turn and attacks the second turn.
HM.suggestion: A must have if you travel a lot.

HM.name: Surf
HM.information: Outside of battle, this will allow you to travel across water. Inside of battle, nothing special as far as added effects go.
HM.suggestion: If you have a water Pokemon, definitely give it this.

HM.name: Strength
HM.information: Outside of battle, this will allow you to move boulders. Inside of battle, nothing special as far as added effects go.
HM.location: Top Floor of the Lost Tower
HM.suggestion: If you have to use it, put it on a Rock Pokemon.

HM.name: De Fog
HM.information: Outside of battle, this will clear the fog in foggy areas. Inside of battle, this will lower the foe's evasiveness.
HM.suggestion: I only used it once during game play. I would not recommend it for a serious moveset.

HM.name: Rock Smash
HM.information: Outside of battle, this will allow you to break rocks. Inside of battle, this may lower the foe's defense.

HM.name: Waterfall
HM.information: Outside of battle, this will allow you to climb waterfalls. Inside of battle, nothing special as far as added effects go.
HM.suggestion: Use on a Water Pokemon with a high attack.

HM.name: Rock Climb
HM.information: Outside of battle, this will allow you to climb certain spots on mountains. Inside of battle, this may inflict confusion upon the foe.
HM.suggestion: Poor accuracy for power, in my opinion. Use if you have high luck confusing the foe.
